scripts.postinstall: if [ x"$CVMFS_MONITOR_MODE" = "xbackend" ]; then (cd backend && npm install -s); else (cd frontend && npm install -s); fi
scripts.build: if [ x"$CVMFS_MONITOR_MODE" = "xbackend" ]; then (cd backend && npm run build); else (cd frontend && npm run build); fi
scripts.start: if [ x"$CVMFS_MONITOR_MODE" = "xbackend" ]; then npm run backend; else npm run frontend; fi
